meanings.definition: Understand or become aware of something.
meanings.sent1: She realized her mistake after looking at the answer key.
meanings.sent2: I realized I forgot my lunch at home when I arrived at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat realized the laser pointer was not a real bug.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, she realized the day had slipped away from her.
meanings.sent5: He realized the importance of time management after missing his deadline.

meanings.definition: Achieve or gain something desired or anticipated.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, she realized her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: The team realized victory after a tough match.
meanings.sent3: The chef realized a new recipe that became an instant hit.
meanings.sent4: She realized her potential when she won the competition.
meanings.sent5: He realized his goal of running a marathon after months of training.

meanings.sent1: They realized their savings to buy a new car.
meanings.sent2: The company realized a profit by selling its old equipment.
meanings.sent3: The farmer realized his crops to invest in new machinery.
meanings.sent4: She realized her inheritance to fund her education.
meanings.sent5: He realized his investments to purchase a house.
